All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class CreoleLanguage
extends AbstractMarkupLanguage

A markup language implementing Creole syntax. See Creole Formatting Rules and Creole Additions for details.

Since:
1.6
Author:
Igor Malinin

toInternalHref

public String toInternalHref(String pageName)
Convert a page name to an href to the page.

Parameters:

Returns:
the href to access the page
